name: group.setVisibleEach()
content:
Sets the visibility for every sprite in the group.

The default visibility is true.

palette_params.name: bool
palette_params.description: The visibility of the group of sprites, true or false.

return_value: No return value. Changes output in the display after drawSprites() is called.
short_description: Sets the visibility for every sprite in the group.
tips:
- A sprite that is not visible can still collide with other sprites and user mouse interactions.
- Groups of sprites all have the same functions and you use the dot notation (combining the name of the group, followed by a dot, with the function name) to call the function for that group of sprites.
- Any changes to the properties of a sprite will not be seen until after `drawSprites()` is called.
